about_the_game:
Good Luck My Lord, a deckbuilding game inspired by Luck be a Landlord. The greedy King is asking for your support. As a lord, you have to fulfill your obligations and demonstrate your loyalty to the King. Collect resources each week and submit demanded resources each quarter. Upgrade your fief and use special items such as Dice or Removal item to help you earn more resources. If you, as a lord, are outstanding enough, perhaps you might have a chance to replace someone's position…

features:

  • 140+ Resources to collect - Each resource has different effects and interactions. Choose resources wisely!
  • 90+ Items to add - Select items that work together with resources to efficiently earn more resources.
  • Upgrade your fief allows you to gain more space for collecting additional resources.
  • Get Dice - Are resources appearing in unfavorable positions? Swap the positions of resources to trigger effects by using Dice.
  • Unlock achievements - Achievements can be unlocked upon achieving victory or encountering failure under specific conditions. Unlock the Removal item that allows you to eliminate unwanted resources.

short_description: Good Luck My Lord is a deckbuilding game where, as a feudal lord, your goal is to collect various resources to contribute to the King. Collect resources each week and submit resources each quarter. Try using different items, upgrading your fief, or obtaining special items to earn more resources!
